snippet: Eliot Spitzer’s tenure as a trustee for the Bernard and Anne Spitzer Charitable Trust gives a small but intriguing window onto how he might manage a far larger pool of money.
abstract: Eliot Spitzer has played major role as trustee for family's $40 million Bernard and Anne Spitzer Charitable Trust for last 12 years, a small but intriguing window into how he might think about investing a far larger pool of money if elected New York City comptroller.
lead_paragraph: Eliot Spitzer’s tenure as a trustee for the Bernard and Anne Spitzer Charitable Trust gives a small but intriguing window onto how he might manage a far larger pool of money.

headline.main: Family Trust Offers Possible Clues to How Spitzer Would Invest City’s Funds
headline.print_headline: Family Trust Offers Possible Clues to How Spitzer Would Invest City’s Funds
